resources.string: A large body of rock and snow falling suddenly on a mountain. Once it happens, it happens. It brings permanent change to its surrounding. No one is stopping it.
These are the people behind the Avalanche. Like what they represent, they are unstoppable, working behind the curtains to provide the best possible.
No words for her. She\'s the boss.
